actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to include certain officers and employees of the Department of Agriculture performing functions under the laws administered by that Department within the provisions of section 1114 of title 18 of the United States Code, relating to homicides of Federal officers in the discharge of their duties.

summary.text: Includes designated officers and employees of the Department of Agriculture performing functions under the laws administered by that Department within the provisions of law which make homicides of Federal officers in the discharge of their duties Federal offences. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 1114)

titles.title: A bill to include certain officers and employees of the Department of Agriculture performing functions under the laws administered by that Department within the provisions of section 1114 of title 18 of the United States Code, relating to homicides of Federal officers in the discharge of their duties.
